LanguageData.RoRA_BladeMarine_Helmet.label: blademarine helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_BladeMarine_Helmet.description: Crafted from lightweight plasteel, this helmet is manufactured for troopers that are adept in close-quarters melee combat.
LanguageData.RoRA_Conscript_Helmet.label: conscript helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_Conscript_Helmet.description: A cheap, easilly produced helmet for military trainees. Despite its cheapness, the helmet has an entry-level yet reliable target-acquisition system that is still more than adequate for general use.
LanguageData.RoRA_Enforcer_Helmet.label: enforcer helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_Enforcer_Helmet.description: A police helmet suitable for urban environments, often used in riots and by guards of high-value assets. A sense of safety is felt when someone is seen on duty with this helmet, along with a bit of curiosity as to how much physical training has been done just to be able to walk with this on.
LanguageData.RoRA_Engineer_Helmet.label: engineer helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_Engineer_Helmet.description: A helmet boasting an advanced computer that helps with construction efficiency with visual scanners that help in electrical troubleshooting.
LanguageData.RoRA_Specialist_Helmet.label: specialist helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_Specialist_Helmet.description: Heavy duty helmet designed for those who are trained in precision shooting with an integrated target acquisition system which helps the power armor to easilly spot an enemy and respond to moving targets.
LanguageData.RoRA_Ranger_Helmet.label: ranger helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_Ranger_Helmet.description: Used primarilly by explorers and big game hunters for its low weight with armor thick enough to stop most animal attacks.
LanguageData.RoRA_Miner_Helmet.label: miner helmet
LanguageData.RoRA_Miner_Helmet.description: A HAZMAT helmet augmented with durable plating able to withstand harsh environments and the occasional encounters with hostile inhabitants.
